message:
Refactor: Move hardcoded values to config and cleanup code

Backend cleanup:
- Move image generation API keys and endpoints to config.py
- Extract magic numbers to named constants (timeouts, retry counts, max tokens)
- Remove duplicate 'requests' import
- Remove unused 'base64' import
- Consolidate duplicate API key definitions
- All hardcoded values now in config.IMAGE_* constants

Benefits:
- Single source of truth for configuration
- Easier to modify timeouts and retry logic
- Better code maintainability
- Proxy functionality already integrated
